website_summaries.verdict: These sturdy heel wheels have a no frills look that older kids and teenagers might find more appealing.
pros: Good quality with a solid build that easily supports both kids and adults
Light up wheels are motion activated and don't require batteries
Polyurethane wheels are rugged and durable
cons: A handful of owners had problems with the straps coming undone

customer_reviews.title: Right on!
customer_reviews.text: Very Cool! Instead of Heelys that you have to replaced every time your kid grows out of them, these adjust to the size of multiple shoes. My son, who is 15, is growing out of shoes every few months as his feet keep growing. These fit his men's adult size shoe of 10.5 and 11 and there is still room to go wider. The lights on the black pair are red, blue and green.
customer_reviews.author: Nikaroni

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived very quickly and are extremely durable! My kids love them. Will definitely highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Macey

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is perfect I guess
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. Unfortunately the hook was not bent enough and I had to bend it a little more to hold it in place over the foot. The hook also have a tendency to come loose from the strap. I think I will be gluing it or sewing it together... Nothing is perfect I guess. Other than that my son REALLY loves these and used them for well over 3 hours after receiving them.
customer_reviews.author: MandaBK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality so far
customer_reviews.text: They look like they are great quality and there is a nice weight to them. They definitely don't seem like the cheap plastic ones you get in the store. The only reason I'm taking away one star is because it's a Christmas gift and upon arrival, the box was damaged. The shipping box was not damaged, but the product box was damaged and they knowingly sent it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The skates are fairly well built. I am deducting ...
customer_reviews.text: The skates are fairly well built. I am deducting one star because my son keeps popping out of just one of the skates: the clip on the elastic strap seems to unexpectedly come out of the slot when he is using them. I've tried bending the tab on the clip a little more to keep it from popping off but no luck, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sabin

customer_reviews.title: My teenager loves these! She's almost 6 feet tall ...
customer_reviews.text: My teenager loves these! She's almost 6 feet tall and growing ... in a size 13 shoe. So the fact that these attach to any shoes she has is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Lucie Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Frictionless but no velocity
customer_reviews.text: I think these need to be redesigned with a single row or rollers. That way the wearer can push off to accelerate. I like the idea of strapping it on to your shoes. If you had one wheel in the back and front, with the front one spring loaded so that you can stop with you toes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not made strong enough for a 13yr old boy!
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed with this product. It says from ages 6 and up. My 13 year old wore these twice and the entire metal piece on the bottom bent. As if not meant for a kid his age/size. Very disappointed as my return window has closed last week, so i cant return it, and he also can't wear them. Complete waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my eight year old and returned it ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my eight year old and returned it. Very hard to hold a balance, even if you know how to skate and ice skate.
customer_reviews.author: cz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and so does my daughter they are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Not New Condition as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: 12/20/18 @ @9:30pmish. This product just arrived in a crumpled up box, the key loose in the box, no instructions and wheels dirty. Will be returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Manning

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son did not really like it. he tried though to get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and a huge hit
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and a huge hit. Kids love them and have used them every single night since receiving them for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: armywife

customer_reviews.title: Only bad thing is the straps keep coming undone and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. Only bad thing is the straps keep coming undone and it's a pain putting them back.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!!! I bought these for a gift and they came used. So mad I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: These are great so far
customer_reviews.text: These are great so far. My 8 yr old is still learning to use but my 14 he old thinks they are cool.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.text: When my son wears these out, multiple people stop to ask where he got them. Easy to put on any shoe, nice and stable and the lights are very cool! A win.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: These are impossible to ride on. Had to return. My daughter couldn't use them.
customer_reviews.author: konadog

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift ever
customer_reviews.text: A year later and my kids still wear these constantly. The lights still work and people stop us everywhere we go to ask about them. We love them and I recommend them to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha F.

customer_reviews.title: Had to purchase a different pair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had these for two days after Christmas and a strap fell off as she was skating. We have not been able to locate the strap so she is unable to use them.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Give them a little time!
customer_reviews.text: This is fun, but will take a bit of a learning curve to be able to use with confidence. That, of course, is part of the fun! I'm sure our nephew is on his way to becoming a pro.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Engstrom

customer_reviews.title: Love the lights and the fact they are adjustable for ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality wheels! Love the lights and the fact they are adjustable for all family members to use! We had lots of fun with them.
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Beware! The strap came undone while my daughter was skating, which resulted in an awful wrist fracture.
customer_reviews.author: Ruchy r.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product! I got a pair for me and one for my son and we love them, they are easy to put on and with some practice easy to use. We will definitely get some more for the rest of the family!
customer_reviews.author: Haydee M.

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my eazy skates today!! My kids absolutely love them! They have been outside on them for hours. I finally found something they could do to have fun with exercise! These will definitely be awesome holiday gifts! Thank you for the quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gift for the small ones, easy to use and fits on most shoes!!!just order a pair for my nephew and can't wait to get mines!
customer_reviews.author: Roger jmnz

product_meta.title: Eazy Rollers Blue heel wheels skates (Black)
product_meta.description: Official Eazyrollers. Classic. Heel skates with flashing wheels that are one size fits all. They easily adjust to fit most shoes from children to adults. Also, Wheels flash with movement without needing batteries. Don't be fooled by competitors, Eazyrollers are the best custom heel skate on the market. Polyurethane wheels assure a smooth ride and long life. Color: black, blue or purple.
feature_bullets: They easily adjust to fit most shoes from children to adults.
Wheels flash with movement without needing batteries.
Polyurethane wheels assure a smooth ride and long life.
